short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you annotate online resources and leverage them to improve your Web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Giild is a personalized learning platform. Giild's chrome extension lets you create bookmarks, highlight webpages and see other people's comments on the page. Giild helps you organize and manage your learning.
